update sa_permission
permission_name=#{permissionName},
group_id=#{groupId},
is_manage=#{manager},
enable=#{enable},
create_by=#{createBy},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_by=#{updateBy},
update_time=#{updateTime},
is_default=#{isDefault},
where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: id, group_id, permission_name, is_manager, enable, create_by, (CASE WHEN sp.create_by is not NULL THEN (SELECT user_name FROM sa_user WHERE id = sp.create_by) ELSE NULL END ) AS createUserName , create_time, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTimeStr, update_by, (CASE WHEN sp.update_by is not NULL THEN (SELECT user_name FROM sa_user WHERE id = sp.update_by) ELSE NULL END ) AS updateUserName , update_time, DATE_FORMAT(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTimeStr, is_default
mapper.insert: insert into sa_permission (group_id, permission_name, is_manager, enable, create_by, create_time) values (#{permission.groupId}, #{permission.permissionName}, #{permission.manager}, #{permission.enable}, #{permission.createBy}, now())
